title: Allows the granting of academic credit at state operated institutions to veterans
summary: Allows the granting of academic credit at state operated institutions of the state university of New York and the senior colleges of the city university of New York to veterans.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to granting academic credit at state operated institutions of the state university of New York and the senior colleges of the city university of New York to veterans
